question: The movie that was directed by Steven Spielberg won several awards.

answers.text: The directed by Steven Spielberg movie won several awards.
The movie directed by Steven Spielberg won several awards.
The movie that directed by Steven Spielberg won several awards.

correct_answer: The movie directed by Steven Spielberg won several awards.
explanation: Bộ phim do Steven Spielberg đạo diễn đã giành được nhiều giải thưởng.
